title: Reimagined Bordeaux Wine Chateau Elegance in the Heart of Chartrons with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Fall in love with the romantic charms of French wine country in Bordeaux with a stay at this chic hotel, housed in the 19th-century Calvet wine cellars and redesigned into a modern five-star escape by the revered Philippe Starck. From its fairytale-like facade to signature interiors bathed in soft light, this hotel redefines the region's authentic charm in cosmopolitan fashion.

Spend your days relaxing and unwinding on the property's expansive terrace and refreshing yourself in the pool and hammam at Spa Mondrian. When hunger strikes, indulge in Asian fusion dishes onsite at celebrity chef Masaharu Morimoto's debut European venue and top off your meal with creative cocktails and Japanese sake at its Festive Bar.

Bordeaux's famous vineyards, charming boutiques and quaint cafes of Rue Sainte-Catherine are mere moments away.

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Bordeaux Centre Chartrons, an IHG Hotel
title: Sophisticated Bordeaux Retreat with Rooftop Restaurant Overlooking River & City Vistas
description: Let the romance, fine wine and awe-inspiring architecture of France sweep you off your feet with a stay at Hotel Indigo Bordeaux Centre Chartrons, an IHG Hotel. Here, boutique sophistication meets trendy design in the heart of Bordeaux, boasting historic French charm with a modern twist. Sit atop Le Tchanque rooftop restaurant and enjoy the panoramic views overlooking the city and river while you sip on local wines and delight in the flavours of a decadent tasting board.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Bordeaux Centre Chartrons, an IHG Hotel

title: Bordeaux Wine Chateau Opulence in the Heart of Chartrons with Luxury Wellness Spa
description:
Discover the romantic allure of Bordeaux’s wine country with a stay at this stylish 19th-century wine cellar turned five-star hotel. Reimagined by the renowned Philippe Starck into a chic and holistic retreat, the hotel masterfully captures the region's timeless charm with its enchanting facade and interiors drenched in soft light.

Relax and rejuvenate on the expansive terrace, take a refreshing dip in the pool or unwind in the hammam at Spa Mondrian Bourdeaux Les Carmes. Savour exquisite Asian fusion dishes at the European debut of celebrity chef Masaharu Morimoto, and finish your meal with innovative cocktails or Japanese sake at Morimoto Bordeaux Bar.

title: Modern Pet-Friendly Bordeaux Self-Contained Studios near Place Gambetta
description:
Place yourself in the heart of Bordeaux’s elegant cityscape with a stay at this modern aparthotel that invites you to slow down and savour life’s finer things. Located near Place Gambetta and the city’s heritage core, it’s the perfect base for wandering tree-lined boulevards, exploring the city's Gothic architecture, tasting world-renowned wines or cruising on the Garonne river.

Begin your morning with a delicious breakfast before exploring the Musée des Beaux-Arts de Bordeaux, local markets or the Cité du Vin. After a day of discovery, retreat to your sleek studio, complete with a fully equipped kitchen, to relax in style. Whether you're here for culture, cuisine or a little of both, enjoy the freedom to live like a local.

title: France Five-Star Bordeaux City Break with Two-Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Experience high-end opulence and refreshing decadence at the lavish InterContinental Bordeaux - Le Grand Hotel, an IHG Hotel, housed in a palatial building with striking architecture and views over Bordeaux's oldest streets. Here, guests can whet their appetite with classic French flavours at Le Bordeaux, settle in with a cocktail at the rooftop Yacht Club or join an immersive journey through French gastronomy at Le Pressoir d’Argent - boasting two Michelin stars and a menu of vintage wines.
location_description: InterContinental Bordeaux - Le Grand Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2-5 Pl. de la Comédie, 33000 Bordeaux, France
